nodes.text: The Athallia sector was a space sector located in the Trailing Sectors portion of the Expansion Region. By 0 ABY, the Athallia sector bordered the Mikaster sector Rimward and the Baroli sector spinward, while sharing the trailing border with the Boeus sector. Together with the Baroli and Boeus sectors, the Athallia sector formed the Expansion Region's Coreward border, neighboring the Inner Rim.

The Athallia sector contained the Athallia system, which in turn was the site of the astronomical object Athallia. The latter was home to the Human police officer Fin Mak'lath, who left Athallia for the Outer Rim Territories planet Bespin at some point by 3 ABY.

The Athallia sector was first mentioned in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas. In 2012, the StarWars.com Essential Atlas Extra: Expansion Region provided the first visual depiction of the Athallia sector.
